lab
Class AbstractShape

java.lang.Object
  lab.AbstractShape
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractSquare, Circle, Rectangle, Triangle
public abstract class AbstractShape
extends java.lang.Object

The abstract class for all shapes. Holds the information about the placement, size, and family of an instance of a shape.
